name: YoonitHandshake
summary: A iOS Cocoa project written in Swift implementing dynamic SSL pinning.
description: "The SSL pinning is a technique mitigating man-in-the-middle attacks against the secure HTTP communication, but has a drawback, the certificate's expiration date. This resolve this problem, implementing dynamic SSL pinning, providing easy to use fingerprint validation on the TLS handshake. The remote server must be the responsible to update the certificate(s)."
